tool_description: Evaluates shipping cost efficiency across carriers, analyzing cost per shipment, weight-based pricing, and value optimization metrics.

shipment_data_id.description: Reference ID for previously retrieved shipping data

performance_metrics_id.description: Reference ID for calculated performance metrics

include_surcharges.description: Whether to include additional fees and surcharges

benchmark_carrier.description: Carrier to use as cost benchmark

roi_calculation.description: Whether to calculate return on investment metrics

error_messages: Invalid data reference: One or both provided data IDs cannot be found or have expired.
Missing cost data: Insufficient pricing information available for analysis.
Invalid cost factor: Supported factors include base_rate, fuel_surcharge, zone_pricing, weight_pricing, dimensional_pricing.
Benchmark carrier not found: The specified benchmark carrier is not present in the dataset.
Invalid weight class format: Weight classes should be formatted as 'min-max' ranges in pounds or kilograms.
usage: Provide shipment_data_id and performance_metrics_id, then specify cost_factors to analyze. Optionally set weight_classes, benchmark_carrier, and other parameters for detailed cost analysis.

cost_per_shipment.description: Average cost per shipment by carrier or category

total_cost_analysis.description: Summary of total cost analysis and recommendations
